name: magnetic-flux
flavor_text: The user manipulates magnetic fields, which raises the Defense and Sp. Def stats of ally Pokémon with the Plus or Minus Ability.
effect_text_extend: Raises the Defense and Special Defense of all friendly Pokémon with plus or minus by one stage.
effect_text_simple: Raises the Defense and Special Defense of all friendly Pokémon with plus or minus by one stage.
